channel.description: Recent content in contingencies on A sea kayak story

item.title: The Contingencies
item.description: By far the biggest hazard on this trip is paddling alone and I strongly believe that I am prepared. Emergency contacts printed on a card on boat: VHF channel 16. 911 Coast Guard SAR PEI Toll-free: 1-800-565-1582 Telephone: 902-427-8200 Personal In terms of geography, there are areas on this trip where there are high cliffs and it is impossible to land. Due to the positioning of the island in St.
